statements: SELECT * FROM nano_material_inventory;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE usage_tracking = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, supplier FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE supplier = 'XYZ Corp';
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier FROM nano_material_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity, supplier, usage_tracking FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE supplier = 'ABC Company' ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE usage_tracking = TRUE
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM nano_material_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT material_name, supplier FROM nano_material_inventory WHERE supplier LIKE '%Chemicals%'
SELECT * FROM nano_materials_inventory;
SELECT material_name, quantity, purchase_date FROM nano_materials_inventory;
SELECT * FROM material_usage_tracking;
SELECT tracking_id, usage_quantity, department FROM material_usage_tracking;
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier, purchase_date FROM nano_materials_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM nano_materials_inventory
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM nano_materials_inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT supplier, purchase_date FROM nano_materials_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier FROM nano_materials_inventory ORDER BY supplier ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT m.material_name, SUM(t.usage_quantity) AS total_usage FROM nano_materials_inventory m JOIN material_usage_tracking t ON m.material_id = t.material_id GROUP BY m.material_name
SELECT * FROM nano_materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name, quantity FROM nano_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity, unit FROM nano_materials;
SELECT * FROM usage_tracking;
SELECT tracking_id, material_id, quantity_used, usage_date FROM usage_tracking;
SELECT * FROM nano_materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_id;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM nano_materials WHERE unit = 'mg' ORDER BY material_name;
SELECT * FROM usage_tracking WHERE quantity_used <= 50 AND usage_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity_used, usage_date FROM nano_materials JOIN usage_tracking ON nano_materials.material_id = usage_tracking.material_id WHERE quantity_used > 30 ORDER BY usage_date;

SELECT supply_chain.shipment_id, material_name, quantity_shipped, ship_date, delivery_date FROM supply_chain JOIN nano_materials ON supply_chain.material_id = nano_materials.material_id WHERE delivery_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity FROM NanoMaterials;
SELECT * FROM UsageLogs WHERE amount_used > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, contact_number FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Research';
SELECT id, material_id, usage_date, amount_used, employee_id FROM UsageLogs WHERE material_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NanoMaterials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, material_name, supplier FROM NanoMaterials WHERE supplier='ABC Supplier' ORDER BY id;
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, u.amount_used FROM Employees e INNER JOIN UsageLogs u ON e.id = u.employee_id WHERE u.usage_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT s.supplier_name, s.email, u.usage_date, u.amount_used FROM Suppliers s INNER JOIN UsageLogs u ON s.id = u.material_id WHERE u.amount_used > 50 ORDER BY u.usage_date DESC;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity, unit FROM NanoMaterials WHERE quantity < 50 AND unit='kg' ORDER BY quantity ASC, material_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Materials ORDER BY material_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT material_name, location FROM Materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal'
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT order_id, quantity_ordered FROM Orders ORDER BY delivery_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM Materials WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' AND location='Warehouse A';
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (SELECT supplier_id FROM Orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01');
SELECT material_name, quantity_used, usage_date FROM Materials JOIN UsageRecords ON Materials.material_id = UsageRecords.material_id WHERE quantity_used > 50 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;

SELECT O.order_id, M.material_name, S.supplier_name FROM Orders O JOIN Materials M ON O.material_id = M.material_id JOIN Suppliers S ON O.supplier_id = S.supplier_id WHERE delivery_date < order_date OR delivery_date IS NULL;
